```{r, echo=FALSE,include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(reshape2)
library(ggpubr)
library(leaflet)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(webshot)
LACitySpecificCase<-read.csv("/Users/huiyudeng/Desktop/USC/R code/Personal_site/t1.csv")
LACitySpecificCase$DailyIncrease<-round((LACitySpecificCase$Case415-LACitySpecificCase$Case414)/LACitySpecificCase$Case414*100,1)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE,include=FALSE}
LAmap<-leaflet(LACitySpecificCase) %>% 
        addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
        addCircles(lng = ~Long, lat = ~Lat, weight = 2, radius = ~sqrt(Case415)*100,
                   popup=~paste(City, "<br>",
                                "Diagnosis: ", Case415, "<br>",
                                "Daily increase: ",DailyIncrease,"%"))
saveWidget(widget = LAmap,
           file = "map1.html",
           selfcontained = FALSE)
```

